title: Fix visual_lines.rs:74 empty vec panic
description: In find_visual_line_and_col, if lines is empty (width=0 edge case), accessing lines[last] panics. Add guard: if lines.is_empty() { return (0, 0); }

logs.msg: Code review identified panic: find_visual_line_and_col accesses lines[last] without checking if lines is empty. Fix: add guard at function start.
